alert.note: Alert for Sherman (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 03 at 3:25PM CDT until October 03 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN KIT CARSON AND WEST CENTRAL SHERMAN COUNTIES... At 225 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles southwest of Burlington, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Burlington around 230 PM MDT. Kanorado around 240 PM MDT. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 0 and 2. Interstate 70 in Colorado between mile markers 423 and 450. Highway 385 between mile markers 178 and 194. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
